channel.title: Change weapon to 1 handed
channel.description:
hey,
Who can help?
All my weapons are two handed and my shields seem to be two handed.
i'm really confused :/
I shouldn't have forgot about how to change this i have found how to make two handed but not how to make them 1 handed ouch.
lol!

item.title: Change weapon to 1 handed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Weapons are one handed by default. Your server is forcing them to be two handed.

Pro tip: It’s all done in the same area.

Read full topic
